price: মই তোমালোকক সংবাদ দিমনে, কাৰ ওপৰত চয়তান অৱতীৰ্ণ হয়?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
